hero.title: Get more out of your workout – activate your core muscles
hero.description: Core Capacity is a professional fitness app that motivates you toward better health by preventing musculoskeletal issues.

cards.title: Experience the power of your core muscles

card1.title: Dynamic exercises
card1.description: Training program videos for core muscle activation – proven to provide over 10% improvement in performance

card2.title: Personal health
card2.description: Prevents musculoskeletal disorders, improves hormonal balance, and increases creativity, productivity, and ability to perform.

card3.title: Program levels
card3.description: The program consists of three different levels that guide you safely as you begin building a stronger core.

about.title: About Core Capacity
about.p1: Our mission is to help people achieve better physical and mental health by activating the core muscles – no matter where they are.
about.p2: Through carefully developed training videos, we guide users from level 1 to level 3, focusing on gradual and safe strengthening of the core. By taking small steps each week, you can unlock your body’s full potential.
about.p3: Registering in our app is the first step toward a healthier and stronger version of yourself – all it takes is determination and consistent effort to achieve lasting results.
about.image_alt: Two people exercising on the floor

cta.title: Unlock your potential with core-focused training led by experts – supported by research and shown to improve performance by over 10.5%.
cta.p1: Whether you spend long days at work or push your limits as an athlete, core strength is key. Activate and strengthen your core for better posture, reduced discomfort, and improved performance.
cta.p2: Our app makes it easy to stay focused and see results – choose from three levels designed to strengthen your core and elevate your training. Start today!

app_mockup.title: Change your life
app_mockup.p1: Core Capacity is a platform designed to help you unlock your full potential, build strength, and support your overall health and well-being
app_mockup.p2: It gives you the tools to strengthen both body and mind – and boosts confidence and focus with every step you take.
app_mockup.p3: Measurements of the effect on young athletes who followed the Core Capacity concept showed a performance increase of over 12% in just 8 weeks.
